visualization.name: Media Player
visualization.help:
### What is Media Player?
This visualization provides a simple and elegant way to play audio and video files directly in your browser. Supported formats include MP3, MP4, OGG, and WAV.
After selecting a dataset, the Media Player will appear, allowing you to easily play, pause, adjust volume, and seek through your media.
This player is powered by [Plyr](https://github.com/sampotts/plyr), a lightweight and customizable media player library.
#### Key Features
- **Playback Controls**: Play, pause, seek, adjust volume, and change playback speed. - **Audio and Video Support**: Supports both music and video content. - **Responsive Design**: Works well on desktop and mobile devices. - **User-Friendly**: Minimal setup â€” just select a dataset and start playing.
For more information about Plyr and its features, visit: [https://github.com/sampotts/plyr](https://github.com/sampotts/plyr)
